getReloadChartJSFunction

public static java.lang.String getReloadChartJSFunction(java.lang.String clientId,
                                                        java.lang.String url,
                                                        int width,
                                                        int height,
                                                        netgest.bo.xwc.framework.XUIRequestContext context)
Creates the necessary reload javascript function for the charts

Parameters:
clientId - The identifier of the chart
url - The url with the servlet (without the client id, see ChartUtils#getServletURL(XUIRequestContext)
width - The width of the chart
height - The height of the Chart
context - The Request Context
Returns:
A string with the javascript function
